ThingDef.label: boxed handgun
ThingDef.description: Considered to be an oddity even around the Rim. Extreme care is necessary to not have one's fingers shot off with this trinket of a gun, but it's better than nothing.

ThingDef.label: light handgun
ThingDef.description: A lightweight handgun manufactured with the same materials as the PDW, as well as use the same rounds designed to penetrate light armor which regular pistol rounds could not.

ThingDef.label: Thunder
ThingDef.description: A rare breech-loaded single shot handgun that uses anti-materiel rounds.

ThingDef.label: Big Iron
ThingDef.description: To a settlement rode a stranger one fine day; hardly spoke to folks around him, didn't have too much to say, no one dared to ask his business, no one dared to make a slip; the stranger there among them had a big iron on his hip... Big Iron on his hip.

ThingDef.label: Muffalo Cannon
ThingDef.description: From the muffalo's pouch, this shorty is quickly drawn in a caravan ambush. While not as intimidating as a regular shotgun, a blast from the mufallo cannon can still be staggering.

ThingDef.label: combat shotgun
ThingDef.description: A shotgun used mainly by town guards in tight spaces. Its fairly decent round capacity makes it ideal for police raids.

ThingDef.label: light carbine
ThingDef.description: A lightweight, blowback operated submachine gun that sprays out bullets at an incredible rate, giving it suitable stopping power for confined spaces.

ThingDef.label: clockwork assault rifle
ThingDef.description: An engineering marvel, often confused for spacer tech for its three-round salvo that fires before the recoil is even felt by the user. With an intimidatingly complex firing mechanism, disassembling this gun for maintenance is often compared to disassembling a mechanoid.

ThingDef.label: PDW
ThingDef.description: A compact and unique firearm manufactured with strong, lightweight plasteel. Often used for its close-quarters combat capabilities and its large magazine capacity.

ThingDef.label: woodland SMG
ThingDef.description: This ancient-pattern submachine gun prides itself in its controllable recoil despite its high rate of fire and weight.

ThingDef.label: compact service rifle
ThingDef.description: A shortened service rifle intended to cut manufacturing costs and bridge the gap between a submachine gun and an assault rifle. Quite reliable, but don't expect too much.

ThingDef.label: modern service rifle
ThingDef.description: An enhanced gas-operation rifle that significantly reduces its recoil with a counter-weight that simultaneously operates towards the opposite direction of the original gas piston.

ThingDef.label: burst rifle
ThingDef.description: An experimental rifle, able to fire a burst of two rounds as fast as mechanically possible before the recoil is felt by the user. This increases the likelihood of a shot hitting the target while increasing target reacquisition with its short burst.

ThingDef.label: subsonic rifle
ThingDef.description: A rifle designed with an integrated supressor. Its use of heavy subsonic ammunition increases its stealth capabilities by eliminating the sonic boom that comes with higher velocity calibers, and for this it has a shorter effective range.

ThingDef.label: battle rifle
ThingDef.description: Semi-automatic rifle intended for medium to long range engagements.

ThingDef.label: lightweight assault machinegun
ThingDef.description: Despite its designation and looks, this machinegun boasts an incredibly light weight which enables its user to also use it as an assault weapon if not used for supressive fire.

ThingDef.label: trench machine gun
ThingDef.description: A relatively cheap machinegun ideal for providing surpressive fire.

ThingDef.label: bullpup sniper rifle
ThingDef.description: A semi-automatic precision rifle where the firing mechanism is located at the back of the gun, which shortens its overall length making it ideal for urban areas. Known to be actually quite rare.

ThingDef.label: Saboteur
ThingDef.description: A long-range bolt-action sniper rifle originally found in urban northern areas. Known for its long range.

ThingDef.label: subatomic penetration rapid fire through your skull
Intervention
ThingDef.description: A bolt-action sniper rifle, renowned for its precision and range. A fair amount of record breaking shots within the Rim were fired from this rifle.

ThingDef.label: anti-materiel rifle
ThingDef.description: A specialized anti-mechanoid rifle usually found at the hands of power armored and bionics augmented troopers strong enough to wield them.

ThingDef.label: Neopup
ThingDef.description: An anti-personnel grenade launcher used for breaching wooden walls and engaging small groups of enemies.

ThingDef.label: tactical sledgehammer
ThingDef.description: A sledgehammer equipped with a thermal scope, tacitcal flashlight and laser sights. The handle also includes an angled foregrip for increased ergonomics. Really, what makes this expensive is the thermal scope.
